name: Tesla Coil
description:
The king wanted you to be a knight so he sent you to the wilderness to train. 

But your dream is to be an electrical engineer so you brought your tesla coil for a test run.

Unfortunately, it's still unstable and it can hurt you. And we don't know when it will go haywire!

When it goes haywire, all you need to do is restart it in the control panel but be careful 'cause even the software is buggy!

Controls:

Move - A D

Jump -  W / Spacebar

Use umbrella - Shift / RMB

Attack - LMB
